rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall aligned to the east side as per Vastu principles.
Bohemian style living room with vibrant colors and art pieces. Includes built-in seating areas.
Open kitchen adjoining the living area, designed to be energy-efficient and Vastu compliant.
Integrated dining space that connects with the kitchen for a seamless flow.
A dedicated home theater area on the ground floor with ambient lighting and acoustic design in line with Bohemian aesthetics.
Private gym setup located at a quieter corner of the ground floor. Designed for optimum space utilization.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned per Vastu to welcome positive energy.
Large windows on the east wall for natural light and ventilation.
